notes: irregular verb; used with auxiliary avere; past participle 'tenuto'
example_sentence_english: I want to keep the secret.
I was holding the baby in my arms.

translation_english: he was holding/she was holding/you (formal) were holding
example_sentence_english: He was always keeping the light on.
We were keeping the door closed.
You (plural) were keeping a good pace.
